Verses: 1 ivaigalukkuppinbu, Boomiyin Naangu Thisaigalilum Naangu Thoodhargal Nindru, Boomiyinmelaavadhu, Samuththiraththin Melaavadhu, Oru Maraththinmelaavadhu, Kaatru Adiyaadhapadikku, Boomiyin Naangu Kaatrugalaiyum Pidiththirukkakkanden.

2 jeevanulla Dhevanudaiya Muththiraik Kolaiyudaiya Veroru Thoodhan Sooriyan Udhikkundhisaiyilirundhu Erivarakkanden; Avan, Boomiyaiyum Samuththiraththaiyum Sedhappaduththugiradharku Adhikaarampetra Andha Naangu Thoodharaiyum Nokki:

3 naam Namadhu Dhevanudaiya Oozhiyakkaararin Netrikgalil Muththiraipottuth Theerumalavum Boomiyaiyum Samuththiraththaiyum Marangalaiyum Sedhappaduththaadhirungal Endru Magaa Saththamittuk Kooppittaan.
4 muththiraipodappattavargalin Thogaiyaich Sollakketten; Isravel Puththirarudaiya Sagala Koththirangalilum Muththiraipodappattavargal Latchaththunaarpaththu Naalaayiramper.
5 yoodhaa Koththiraththil Muththiraipodappattavargal Panneeraayiram. Rooban Koththiraththil Muththiraipodappattavargal Panneeraayiram. Gaadh Koththiraththil Muththiraipotappattavargal Panneeraayiram.

6 aaser Koththiraththil Muththiraipodappattavargal Panneeraayiram. Napthali Koththiraththil Muththiraipodappattavargal Panneeraayiram. Manaase Koththiraththil Muththiraipodappattavargal Panneeraayiram.

7 simiyon Koththiraththil Muththiraipodappattavargal Panneeraayiram. Levi Koththiraththil Muththiraipodappattavargal Panneeraayiram. Isakkaar Koththiraththil Muththiraipodappattavargal Panneeraayiram.

8 sebulon Koththiraththil Muththiraipodappattavargal Panneeraayiram. Yoseppu Koththiraththil Muththiraipodappattavargal Panneeraayiram. Penyameen Koththiraththil Muththiraipodappattavargal Panneeraayiram.

9 ivaigalukkuppinbu, Naan Paarththapodhu, Idho, Sagala Jaadhigalilum Koththirangalilum Janangalilum Paashaigalilirumirundhu Vandhadhum, Oruvanum Ennakkoodaadhadhumaana Thiralaana Koottamaagiya Janangal, Vellai Angigalaith Thariththu, Thangal Kaigalil Kuruththolaigalaip Pidiththu, Singaasanaththirku Munbaagavum Aattukkuttiyaanavarukku Munbaagavum Nirkakkanden.
10 avargal Magaa Saththamittu: Ratchippin Magimai Singaasanaththinmel Veetrirukkira Engal Dhevanukkum Aattukkuttiyaanavarukkum Undaavadhaaga Endru Aarppariththaargal.
11 thoodhargal Yaavarum Singaasanaththaiyum Mooppargalaiyum Naangu Jeevangalaiyum Soozhanindru, Singaasanaththirkumunbaaga Muganguppura Vizhundhu, Dhevanaith Thozhudhukondu:
12 aamen, Engal Dhevanukkuth Thudhiyum Magimaiyum Gnaanamum Sthoththiramum Ganamum Vallamaiyum Belanum Sadhaakaalangalilum Undaavadhaaga; Aamen, Endraargal.
13 appozhudhu, Mooppargalil Oruvan Ennai Nokki: Vellai Angigalaith Thariththirukkira Ivargal Yaar? Engeyirundhu Vandhaargal? Endru Kettaan.

14 adharku Naan: Aandavane, Adhu Umakke Theriyum Endren. Appozhudhu Avan: Ivargal Migundha Ubaththiravaththilirundhu Vandhavargal; Ivargal Thangal Angigalai Aattukkuttiyaanavarudaiya Raththaththile Thoiththu Veluththavargal.

15 aanapadiyaal, Ivargal Dhevanudaiya Singaasanaththirku Munbaaga Irundhu, Iravum Pagalum Avarudaiya Aalayaththile Avaraich Sevikkiraargal; Singaasanaththinmel Veetrirukkiravar Ivargalukkulle Vaasamaayiruppaar.
16 ivargal Ini Pasiyadaivadhumillai, Ini Thaagamadaivadhumillai; Veyilaavadhu Ushnamaavadhu Ivargalmel Paduvadhumillai.

17 singaasanaththin Maththiyilirukkira Aattukkuttiyaanavare Ivargalai Meyththu, Ivargalai Jeevaththanneerulla Ootrugalandaikku Nadaththuvaar; Dhevandhaame Ivargaludaiya Kanneer Yaavaiyum Thudaippaar Endraan.
